title: Prevalence and risk factors for refractive error in older adults in eight ethnicities in China: The China national health survey
content:
Publication date: 15 September 2024

Source: Heliyon, Volume 10, Issue 17

Author(s): Xuqian Wang, Rui luo, Guangliang Shan, Huijing He, Ting Chen, Xuejiao Wang, Linyang Gan, Yuhan Wang, Yuyu Chou, Jiantao Cui, Pan Li, Yong Zhong, Jin Ma
